title: Permabanned carryover
body: Is there a way to carry over in game settings (or copy paste) from my permabanned accounts? I'm tired of constantly having to set them up every couple days it takes 5-10 mins per account. Just a small annoyance but one none the less.

replies.body:
To answer your question: No. 

I'm also going to lock the thread because "stop getting permabanned" is not an appropriate response to the question. Also because the question itself isn't even a Player Behavior topic and should have been posted in GD or AtC.
Maybe don't get permabanned every few days...?

easier said than done

you can behave for hundreds of games and troll a single time or drop one slur and youre gone

tried many times... take this account for instance, I was clean for 19 levels and one game later im gone for two weeks

No. It's done just as easily as said.

Hundreds of games. A single warning is all I've had.

Maybe if you have that much trouble keeping your temper in check you should try a therapist.

It has nothing to do with temper lol, you guys always make assumptions. All it takes is the wrong trigger words or phrases and typing too much irrelevant nonsense it chat. Every time I get banned I'm completely calm or in a good mood just calling people shitters or sister fuckers. Not every ban is some pc nerd smashing his keyboard into his monitor from his moms basement.

so you'd rather make a new account every time someone annoys you instead of hitting the mute button and keeping your account?

cool hobby you got there!

I mean yeah once you lose your first account you go into a mindset of having nothing to lose. Am I going to play seriously again to regain the last 3-4 years worth of progress? Obviously not. So I treat accounts like they are disposable now because that's exactly what they are when you have nothing of value to lose on the accounts. Not even trying to be edgy, that's just the reality of how permabans work. They are designed to keep you away, so when you actually keep playing and make new accounts its breeds a care free mindset.

if you had a care free mindset, you wouldn't care enought to flame anyone anymore

but here you are getting triggered every single time over the smallest things. you're not so much edgy as you are full of it
Alternatively, you could just stop copping permabans lol
Making a new account after permad is a "small annoyance"? Are you just bragging about your loser streak?
no I figured people would think im trolling, I actually was curious cause its annoying.
You take no personal responsibility for annoying people _constantly_, but one small annoyance to you needs to be resolved?

I take full responsibility for my actions, I just disagree with the rules so I choose to ignore them at my own expense. And it doesn't need to be resolved I was just curious if they have ways to transfer settings between accounts. Wants and needs are two different things.
